fields.headline: This week's festival news
fields.bodyText: Broken Bells, Mount Kimbie and Rye Rye join a bill at Big Chill (5-8 Aug, Eastnor Castle Deer Park, Herefordshire) that includes Bebel Gilberto, plus the chance to be a part of Spencer Tunick's next nude landscape ... Dance giants dominate at South West Four Weekender (28-29 Aug, Clapham Common, SW4) with Fatboy Slim, Carl Cox and Armin Van Buuren on the bill ... White Rabbits, Villagers, Cocknbullkid and Level 42 are new additions to Rob Da Bank's annual Bestival (9-12 Sep, Robin Hill Country Park, Isle Of Wight) ... Cagedbaby, Silicone Soul and DJs including A La Fu have confirmed for north-east music and arts fest Wizard (27-28 Aug, New Deer Showground, Craigieford Park, nr Turriff) ... COMING SOON Can Orbital top their Glastonbury moment with Matt Smith? The dance veterans join the likes of Tinie Tempah and Fucked Up at Guilfest (Fri to 18 Jul, Stoke Park, Guildford) … NOW BOOKING Misty In Roots and an acoustic set from the Quireboys top Off The Tracks (3-5 Sep, Donington Park Farmhouse, Castle Donington).
